me.wobblyyyy.pathfinder2.utils

Class Button

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.wobblyyyy.pathfinder2.utils.Button

  • public class Button
extends java.lang.Object
    A very simple boolean button.
    Since:
    0.0.0
    Author:
    Colin Robertson

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Button(java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.Boolean> stateSupplier)
      Create a new Button.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isNotPressed()
      Is the button currently NOT active?
      boolean isPressed()
      Is the button currently active?
      boolean wasPressed()
      Was the button just pressed? When a button is pressed, this method will return true one time, until the button is released and pressed again.
      boolean wasReleased()
      Was the button just released? When a button is released, this method will return true one time, until the button is pressed and released again.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Button

        public Button(java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.Boolean> stateSupplier)
        Create a new Button.
        Parameters:
        stateSupplier - a method that returns the button's state.

    • Method Detail

      • isPressed

        public boolean isPressed()
        Is the button currently active?
        Returns:
        true if the button is pressed, false if the button is not pressed.

      • isNotPressed

        public boolean isNotPressed()
        Is the button currently NOT active?
        Returns:
        false if the button is pressed, true if the button is pressed.

      • wasPressed

        public boolean wasPressed()
        Was the button just pressed? When a button is pressed, this method will return true one time, until the button is released and pressed again.
        Returns:
        was the button just pressed? This method will only return true once per button press.

      • wasReleased

        public boolean wasReleased()
        Was the button just released? When a button is released, this method will return true one time, until the button is pressed and released again.
        Returns:
        was the button just released? This method will only return true once per button press.
